Ext.button.Button Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.1.0
  • Ext.button.Button
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.button.Button Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
        renderTo: document.body,
        text: 'Click me',
        scale: 'large'
    });
});
